resources.string: package provides a home-screen widget. Home screen widgets moved to SD/storage will no longer work. Are you sure you want to move this to external storage or SD card? (You can always move it back.)
Are you sure you want to move
to external storage or SD card?
from external storage or SD card?
Your device is not compatible with this application.
You need root privileges on your device for SuperDim to work. You may want to search the web for "root" and the name of your device on how to achieve this and consult local laws.
